title: Looking forward to India's hybrid vehicle policy to tap opportunity: Automobili Lamborghini
description: Italian luxury automaker Automobili Lamborghini is eyeing India's new hybrid vehicle policy to boost its growth prospects in the country. Following the launch of its plug-in hybrid Urus SUV priced at Rs 4.57 crore, Lamborghini plans to introduce more hybrid models. The company anticipates continued growth in India, bolstered by the nation's emerging hybrid policies and rapid economic expansion.
